lyrics.stanza: It is God who firmly attaches us, It is God who firmly attaches us, It is God who firmly attaches us, With you unto Christ.
It is God, it is us, It is Christ as the Spirit.
It is God who has anointed us, It is God who has anointed us, It is God who has anointed us, With the Spirit in our hearts.
